title: Here are all the new wallpapers from the upcoming Motorola Edge 30
content:
After debuting the Motorola Edge Plus 2022 (AKA Motorola Edge 30 Pro) in February this year, Motorola is now gearing up to launch a mid-range Motorola Edge 30 series device. Previous leaks suggest that the upcoming Motorola Edge 30 will feature Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 778G Plus chip, a 6.55-inch OLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate,

The post Here are all the new wallpapers from the upcoming Motorola Edge 30 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Download the new wallpapers from the upcoming Motorola Edge 30 from the link in this post and give your homescreen a fresh look.
